config.placeholder: The passed-in arguments will be used

script:
function alfred_args {
  /usr/bin/osascript -l JavaScript -e 'function run(argv) { return JSON.stringify({ alfredworkflow: { arg: argv } }) }' "${@}"
}

repos=()

for input in "${@}"
do
  repo_root="$(git -C "${input}" rev-parse --show-toplevel)"
  repos+=("${repo_root}")
done

alfred_args "${repos[@]}"
taskDescription: Get path to repository root folder
